FuncDef: This command assigns a DHCP6 filter to the group interface. This feature is used where the SR 7750 is the second DHCP6 relay or where DHCP6 messages are snooped for subscriber management. The filter can be used to bypass host creation, drop DHCP6 message, or perform no action.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the DHCP6 filter ID for this interface. Values-1 to 65535.
